about_the_game:
You have set yourself the task and are on the search for the murderer in Wolpertshofen. But the village has its own rules. There is a curfew at night and anyone who doesn't duck gets one. The only thing that helps is Kathi's Rahmschwammerl.
In the solution book you will learn everything about game mechanics, buffs, skill leveling, item crafting and much more. On numerous maps you will discover useful items and important locations. Additional overviews will help you better understand the villagers. The walkthrough in the last chapter shows you the optimal criminal investigation path and strings together interviews and observations to form an irrefutable chain of evidence.
IMPORTANT: Only available in German! After the "installation" the book will be saved as a PDF in your Steam game folder.
